```{r}
library(ggplot2)
mimic_data %>%
  filter(anytime_expire_flag == 1) %>%
  
  arrange(desc(days_until_death)) %>%
  
  head(5) %>%

# Change the point size, and shape
ggplot(aes(x=icu_admit_age, y=days_until_death)) +
  geom_point(shape=23) + 
  labs(x = 'Age',
           y = 'Days until Death')
  
```
